RelatedSentence: Russia assisted relief materials worth of AFN 20 million for flood affected in Northern provinces of Afghanistan .
The relief materials were handed - over by Russian Ambassador to H.E. Wais Ahmad Barmak , Deputy of National Emergency Committee and Minister of Rural Rehabilitation and Development .
The materials will be distributed on those who have been affected by the recent flash floods and landslides .
